response.overview: Exotic locales and thrilling high seas adventure highlight this sweeping swashbuckler that chronicles the life of Edward Teach, the ruthless 18th-century privateer who terrorized the world's waterways under the moniker Blackbeard. Action-packed Hallmark Channel miniseries stars Angus Macfadyen, Mark Umbers, Jessica Chastain, Rachel Ward, Stacy Keach, and Richard Chamberlain.
response.title: Blackbeard
